statements: DELETE FROM music_therapists WHERE qualification = 'Licensed Music Therapist';
DELETE FROM music_therapists WHERE certification = 'Advanced Certified';
DELETE FROM qualifications WHERE therapist_id = 1 AND completion_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM certifications WHERE issuing_organization = 'ABC Organization' AND issue_date > '2021-06-30';
DELETE FROM therapist_training WHERE therapist_id = 1 AND session_id = 3;
DELETE FROM therapist_certifications WHERE therapist_id = 2 AND certification_id = 5;
